short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Meet Kai, the AI trading wizard that will help you improve & speed up your trading analysis.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Meet Kai, the AI trading wizard that will help you improve & speed up your trading analysis. Powered by OpenAI's GPT-4o.

Kai is an TradingView assistant that helps in: 

1. Becoming a better trader [Elite].
2. Gain valuable insights from your TradingView chart.
3. Speed up the trading analysis.

It's free to download and use. We are keeping user privacy as the priority.
